text: @realDonaldTrump Gov. Greg Abbott “suggests” Texans stay home unless they need to be out. Texas reports all-time daily high 5,489 new COVID-19 cases. #AbbottBetrayedTexas #GOPComplicit https://t.co/ObGrEjAP9L
